name: AI Risk Assessment Tools & APIs
description: Comprehensive free tools, APIs, and software for automated risk assessment across 13 categories

tools.name: EU AI Act Classifier
tools.description: Classify AI systems according to EU AI Act risk levels based on use case and sector

tools.name: SPDX License Checker
tools.description: Validate open source licenses for training data compliance

tools.name: TinEye Reverse Image Search
tools.description: Detect potential IP infringement in AI-generated images

tools.name: Copyscape Plagiarism Checker
tools.description: Check AI outputs for potential plagiarism and content copying

tools.name: EUR-Lex API
tools.description: Access EU legislation database for compliance checking

tools.name: GDPR Article Checker
tools.description: Map AI operations to relevant GDPR articles

tools.name: HaveIBeenPwned API
tools.description: Check if passwords or emails have been exposed in data breaches

tools.name: NVD CVE Lookup
tools.description: Search NIST National Vulnerability Database for CVEs

tools.name: VirusTotal API
tools.description: Scan files and URLs for malware and security threats

tools.name: Shodan Search
tools.description: Search for exposed devices and services on the internet

tools.name: URLhaus Malware URLs
tools.description: Check URLs against known malware distribution sites

tools.name: Hardenize
tools.description: Comprehensive security configuration analysis

tools.name: SSL Labs API
tools.description: Deep analysis of SSL/TLS configuration

tools.name: AbuseIPDB
tools.description: Check IP addresses against abuse reports database

tools.name: Prompt Injection Detector
tools.description: Detect prompt injection and jailbreak attempts in LLM inputs

tools.name: CodeCarbon
tools.description: Track carbon emissions from compute operations

tools.name: ML CO2 Impact Calculator
tools.description: Estimate carbon footprint of ML model training

tools.name: Electricity Maps API
tools.description: Real-time carbon intensity of electricity by region

tools.name: Green Web Foundation API
tools.description: Check if websites and hosting use green energy

tools.name: Cloud Carbon Footprint
tools.description: Measure cloud usage carbon footprint across providers

tools.name: Website Carbon Calculator
tools.description: Calculate carbon emissions of web pages

tools.name: Evidently AI
tools.description: ML model monitoring and data drift detection

tools.name: Alibi Detect
tools.description: Outlier, drift and adversarial detection

tools.name: RAGAS
tools.description: Evaluation framework for RAG pipelines

tools.name: DeepEval
tools.description: Unit testing framework for LLM applications

tools.name: Hugging Face Evaluate
tools.description: Standard evaluation metrics for ML models

tools.name: LangSmith
tools.description: Debug and monitor LLM applications

tools.name: Weights & Biases
tools.description: ML experiment tracking and model monitoring

tools.name: PromptFoo
tools.description: Test and evaluate LLM prompts systematically

tools.name: SHAP Explainer
tools.description: Explain ML model predictions with SHAP values

tools.description: Local interpretable model-agnostic explanations

tools.name: InterpretML
tools.description: Interpretable machine learning techniques

tools.name: What-If Tool

tools.name: Axe Accessibility
tools.description: Web accessibility testing for AI interfaces

tools.name: AI Fairness 360
tools.description: Comprehensive fairness metrics and bias mitigation

tools.name: Fairlearn
tools.description: Assess and improve fairness of ML models

tools.name: Aequitas
tools.description: Bias and fairness audit toolkit

tools.name: Moderation API

tools.name: Disaggregated Evaluation
tools.description: Evaluate model performance across demographic groups

tools.description: K-anonymity, l-diversity, t-closeness

tools.description: Validate and check email addresses

tools.description: Measure toxicity and harmful content

tools.description: Track and log human oversight actions per Article 14 requirements
